dcterms:creator: Rui Xia
Zixiang Ding
dcterms:description: The ECPE dataset is a typical and widely used dataset for the Emotion-Cause Pair Extraction (ECPE) task, which aims to extract emotions and causes as pairs from documents. It highlights the position bias problem in emotion-cause pairs.
dcterms:title: ECPE Dataset

dcterms:creator: Lin Gui
Dongyin Wu
Ruifeng Xu
Qin Lu
Yu Zhou
dcterms:description: The Emotion Cause Extraction Corpus is constructed to facilitate event-driven emotion cause extraction, containing a collection of documents annotated with emotion-cause pairs.
dcterms:title: Emotion Cause Extraction Corpus
